'''Sanctifying Essence''' is an [[Artifact Enhancement Material]] used to provide 10,000 [[Artifact EXP]] to enhance an [[Artifact]]. 

==How to Obtain==
It is purchasable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=360}}. This requires reaching [[Trust Rank]] 8.

It can also be obtained by completing each [[Archon Quest]] [[:Category:Archon Quest Acts|Act]] and claimed in Guide page of the [[Adventurer Handbook]].
